me rata ada watila thiyena prapathayen godaganna puluwan apita witharayi kiyala janadhipathithumath dannawa, rate janathawath dannawa. 2005 nowambar mase balayata path wunata passe apita muhuna denna wune lesi pahasu abhiyogawalata noweyi. 2007 di yuddaye uchchathama awasthawedi mage aanduwa ech.es.bi.si bankuwan dolar miliyana 500ka nayak gaththama yu.en.pi eken bankuwa watakarala kiwuwa mudal denna epa, dunnoth, eegollange aanduwak yatathe ee salli aapahu gewanne na kiyala. 2009 aprel mase yuddaya iwara wena onna menna kiyala thiyenakota, jathyanthara mulya aramudalen apita ema aayathanaye samajika ratak hatiyata enna thibunu naya mudalakawahira kala.
